title: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The BidiUtil class in win32 currently uses the Class.forName() method.
EB:
The BidiUtil class in win32 should have a private constructor to prevent unnecessary instantiation. Additionally, the line mentioned above should be changed to: 
static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), "windowProc", 4);
SR:
Change the line mentioned above to: 
static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), "windowProc", 4); The change should ensure that the code functions in the same way as before.
